predicate.note: Frames file for 'riff' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment.

example.name: the one example
example.text: Line by line Mr. Friedman's weary cynicism can be amusing, especially when he's riffing on the Hollywood social scheme -- the way people size each other up, immediately canceling the desperate ones who merely almost made it.
example.arg: the Hollywood social scheme -- the way people size each other up, immediately canceling the desperate ones who merely almost made it
